headline: Adobe Valuation Questioned As Figma AI Credits Challenge Creative Cloud
summary: Figma has introduced an AI credit based monetization model aimed at designers who frequently use generative tools, directly targeting Adobe's core audience. The move comes as the design software market adjusts to rapid generative AI adoption and to questions around how these tools will be priced and packaged. For Adobe, the development raises fresh competitive pressure on its Creative Cloud offering and its approach to AI features across products. Adobe, listed as NasdaqGS:ADBE, is coming...
